body.title: Van Heusen Men's Cotton Regular Fit Athleisure Colour Fresh Polo T-Shirt - 100% Combed - Moisture Wicking, Ultra Soft
top_reviews: I recently purchased the Van Heusen Men Athleisure Colour Fresh Polo T-Shirt, and I couldn't be happier with my choice. The 100% combed cotton fabric feels incredibly soft against the skin, offering unmatched comfort throughout the day.One of the standout features is the moisture-wicking capability, which keeps me cool and dry even during intense activities. The ultra fabric lives up to its name, providing excellent breathability and durability.The fit is perfect and the Color Fresh technology ensures the t-shirt retains its vibrant color even after multiple washes. It’s a versatile addition to my wardrobe, suitable for both casual outings and sports activities.Overall, I highly recommend the Van Heusen Athleisure Polo T-Shirt for anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and high-performance shirt. It's definitely worth every penny!

Jet black colour. Material is nice and soft. Fits perfectly.

Jet black colour. Material is nice and soft. Fits perfectly.

The thing I like the most about Van Heusen is value for money factor. Price point is just right and quality is superb. I have many van heusen products ranging from under garments to casuals to polo shirt. All of them are superb in quality and extremely comfortable not to mention the premium look and feel.
